description: Returns details about a repository link. A repository link allows Git sync to monitor and sync changes from files in a specified Git repository.

parameters.name: RepositoryLinkId
parameters.description: The ID of the repository link to get.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkInfo
nested_items.description: The information returned for a specified repository link.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key for the repository associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for the repository associated with the repository link, such as the owner ID in GitHub.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The provider type for the connection, such as GitHub, associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository associated with the repository link.
